featured.text: “Adam Joshua!” yelled Nelson, pushing away a basketball and shaking a toy frog off his foot.
As a result, about 95 % of Australia’s mammals and 94 % of its frogs are found __(30)__ else in the world.

definition.zh_def: 一種通常生活在水邊的兩棲動物，具有長腿和光滑的皮膚，能夠跳躍和發出叫聲。
definition.en_def: A typically aquatic amphibian with long legs and smooth skin, capable of jumping and croaking.
definition.example: The frog jumped from one lily pad to another.
